snippet.title: Goliath Depot Trailer - 2D Arcade Game Inspired by Hotel Mario!
snippet.description:
A short indie neo-retro platformer inspired by the infamous Hotel Mario!
Go around 40 levels to slap doors, kill enemies and solve the mystery of the greedy Goliath Corporation.

You can buy the game on Steam
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2479030/Goliath_Depot/

It's also available on Nintendo Switch
https://www.nintendo.com/en-ca/store/products/goliath-depot-switch

For any other inquiries, go to https://linktr.ee/vidvadgames !
Thank you very much for watching!
